meanings.definition: A person who is not actively involved in the day-to-day operations or decision-making of a company.
meanings.sent1: The nonexecutives in the company focus on their specific tasks.
meanings.sent2: The board meeting included both executives and nonexecutives.
meanings.sent3: The nonexecutives organized a surprise party for the CEO.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the nonexecutives were portrayed as the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The nonexecutives play a crucial role behind the scenes.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of individuals who do not hold executive positions within an organization.
meanings.sent1: The nonexecutives team worked diligently on the project.
meanings.sent2: Her nonexecutives colleagues supported her promotion.
meanings.sent3: The nonexecutives dress code was more casual than the executives'.
meanings.sent4: The nonexecutives perspective brought a fresh outlook to the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The nonexecutives culture fostered collaboration among all staff.
